official-title.#text:
To amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize
		  individuals who are pursuing programs of rehabilitation, education, or training
		  under laws administered by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to receive
		  work-study allowances for certain outreach services provided through
		  congressional offices, and for other purposes.

header.#text:
Expansion of work-study

text.#text:
